interopDevnetDescription1: Interop Devnet 0 is a blockchain testnet designed for developers to experiment with dApps and smart contracts in a high-speed, low-latency environment.
interopDevnetDescription2: To get started, you'll need some test tokens. These tokens are free and can be used to deploy and test your projects.
forgeDescription: FORGE is our platform's utility token, designed to empower users and facilitate interactions within the ecosystem. Claim your FORGE tokens and start playing!

HomePage.description: Start to play, get Airdrop, Stake tokens, Borrow, Lend, and Gamefi in one playground.

stake.title: Stake
stake.description: Stake your Interop Devnet 0 tokens to earn FORGE rewards.

borrowLend.title: Borrow & Lend
borrowLend.description: Borrow and lend using your FORGE tokens.

StakingPage.headerTitle: Stake Interop Devnet 0 to Earn FORGE
StakingPage.headerDescription: Interop Devnet 0 holders can stake their tokens to earn FORGE rewards while contributing to the security and growth of the platform. In rare cases of instability, your stake may be partially slashed to mitigate risks, adding an additional layer of protection.
StakingPage.option1Description: Stake for 30 days at an APY of 10%. Rewards are calculated as (Amount * 10% * (days staked / 365)) FORGE tokens.
StakingPage.option2Description: Stake for 60 days at an APY of 15%. Rewards are calculated as (Amount * 15% * (days staked / 365)) FORGE tokens.
StakingPage.option3Description: Stake for 120 days at an APY of 27%. Rewards are calculated as (Amount * 27% * (days staked / 365)) FORGE tokens.
StakingPage.stakeInputLabel: Enter the amount of tokens you want to stake:
StakingPage.withdrawConfirmText:
Confirm withdrawal of your staked tokens.
Note: A withdraw fee will be applied.
StakingPage.stakeValidationMsg: Please enter an amount and select a duration
StakingPage.stakeFailed: Failed to stake tokens. Please try again.
StakingPage.withdrawSuccess: Deposit #{index} withdrawn successfully! Withdraw fee: {fee}% applied.
StakingPage.withdrawFailed: Failed to withdraw deposit. Please try again.
StakingPage.emergencyWithdrawAmountNeeded: Please enter an amount for emergency withdrawal
StakingPage.emergencyWithdrawFailed: Emergency withdrawal failed. Please try again.
